title: Immature Radioactive Samurai Slugs
description: Picasso, Warhol, Rockwell, and Grandma Moses are totally radical gnarly dudes, cowabunga homeboys with nothing to lose.
parent: Tiny Toon Adventures: How I Spent My Vacation
